foreignData.name: Schlafüberträger
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Immer wenn der Schlafüberträger einem Spieler erfolgreich Schaden zufügt, tappe eine Kreatur Deiner Wahl, die dieser Spieler kontrolliert. Diese Kreatur enttappt nicht während der Enttapp-Phase ihres Beherrschers, solange der Schlafüberträger im Spiel bleibt.

name: Somnophore
originalText:
Flying
Whenever Somnophore successfully deals damage to a player, tap target creature that player controls. That creature does not untap during its controller's untap phase as long as Somnophore remains in play.

rulings.text: It can end up holding more than one creature tapped.
You can choose the same creature more than once (for no additional effect).

text:
Flying
Whenever Somnophore deals damage to a player, tap target creature that player controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Somnophore remains on the battlefield.
